name: Amazing Calzone Delivery Mobile Cat
description:
CONTROLS: LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS TO MOVE, SPACE TO JUMP.  Sorry for not adding this to the game.

Game made for the 4th Godot Wild Jam. Deliver calzones as a cat with wheels! Something special will happen if you deliver them fast. Art and music performance by mofumofu, you can also find the project on github

DISCLAMER: While the game has a web-playable version, godot's web assembly export is not very good on dealing with audio because of its poor multithread support. In order to get the full audio experience, please download the PC version.

I have noticed the game does not work on most versions of Chrome. Firefox is recommend for playing the game :)
